name: StakeStone USD
description: StakeStone is building omnichain liquidity infrastructure. Its flagship product, STONEUSD, is a yield-bearing stablecoin that generates organic, sustainable returns through a competitive funding rate arbitrage strategy. Its rebalancing on-chain asset structure enables deeper DeFi integration and composability for advanced strategies. Crucially, its native omnichain design allows liquidity to flow and be utilized frictionlessly across different ecosystems.
